entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then snow or ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
